content:
本件保存七年 C2-62- 1407
May 4, 2
MEMORANDUM
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by C. C. Chang
Subject
: Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)
Reference is made to the attached copies pf SDC letter SUC- 5044 dated April 28, 1962 and KKA letter Mx-1474 dated April 27, 1962.
In the above letter, 00 requested that steel bars, cast iron bars, tool steel and steel plates be procured. If you cen- cur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Encl. copies of SDC and MKA letters cc: SDC JGWhite (with copies of SDC and MKA letters) BBS
( " . 2D ( )
)
E-16.13.2 29th Academia Historica
51. 3. 100× 200
462
